results.title: Simvastatin and losartan enhance nitric oxide and reduce oxidative stress in salt-induced hypertension.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@Heart@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperaldosteronism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006929 @@@renal ALDO@@@ were reduced by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@, and the combination.
